title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, lavender and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist.  Yellow applied over blue for green (chintz).
description: Parts of floral bouquets within guard stripes of red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, lavender and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist.  Yellow applied over blue for green (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-19.
